Preliminary analysis by Spectator reveals that other news sources have potentially underestimated Columbia property holdings

Columbia has the most property holdings among peer private universities in New York City.

Each building represents five property holdings. Columbia has 2.1 times the number of property holdings as New York University.

Columbia (252 property holdings)

120 Columbia properties have owners with names other than “Trustees of Columbia.”

NYU (119 property holdings)

Fordham University (25 property holdings)

Source: NYC PLUTO

Graphic by Adina Cazacu-De Luca
